item.title: Awesome Wm
item.description: What is a Window Manager ? A window manager, as its name implies manages the windows on your destkop. It controls things like the placement and appearance of your windows. It also controls things like tiling and floating of window. What is a tiling or floating window manager ? A floating window manager is generally what everyone uses, it is used in almost all desktop environments. The windows literally float on the screen and one can drag them anywhere.

item.title: GL Paint
item.description: Paint is bloated The MS Paint application is bloated and so I needed something better, something simpler, something less “bloated” and so I set out on a quest to make my own “unbloated” paint application from scratch. Not really, this is something I worked on with 2 friends for a college semester project. Basically it is a paint application written in c++ and uses OpenGL. For now it doesn’t have anything worth calling a feature, it is a paint application and it does that pretty well.
